name: Walk (NoiroVideoGames)
description:
Welcome to Walk. 

Walk is a game where you do nothing but walking. The game is supposed to be slow and relaxing. Exploring different areas of the game map, and learning to slow down in life. 

This game is in early dev and many updates are to come if people find it relaxing.

Priorities to game updates include

*Saving your game spot so you don't have to start at the same location every time you restart the game. 

*Postcard collection of spots you have visited on the map to keep track of areas you have covered

*MP3 player with a variety of music to listen to while you are out on your walk. 

The minimum system recommendations 

GPU RTX 2060 Super or 5700XT
